mapper.select: SELECT PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, P.LPROD_GU, LPROD_NM, P.BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE, PROD_TOTALSTOCK, PROD_MILEAGE FROM PROD P INNER JOIN LPROD LP ON(P.LPROD_GU = LP.LPROD_GU) INNER JOIN BUYER B ON(P.BUYER_ID = B.BUYER_ID)

SELECT PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, LPROD_GU, BUYER_ID, PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE, PROD_SALE, PROD_OUTLINE, PROD_DETAIL, PROD_IMG, PROD_TOTALSTOCK, TO_CHAR(PROD_INSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PROD_INSDATE, PROD_PROPERSTOCK, PROD_SIZE, PROD_COLOR, PROD_DELIVERY, PROD_UNIT, PROD_QTYIN, PROD_QTYSALE, PROD_MILEAGE FROM PROD WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}
